pr_title: Avoid overflow by converting to long

timeline.message: Avoid overflow by converting to long

timeline.bodyText:
Hi, is this really needed?
I think PrimitiveArrayManager.ARRAY_SIZE * 8 is far less than  Integer.MAX_VALUE.
(even the overflow may occur,  just changing 8 to 8L is fine, right?)
timeline.author: jixuan1989
